Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of configuration items that are accurately documented and managed.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Accurate Configuration Items / Total Configuration Items * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Configuration item change request cycle time.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to process and implement a change request for a configuration item from submission to completion.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Time for Change Requests (Total Time for Requests / Number of Requests)

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Degree to which version control practices for configuration items adhere to established standards and procedures.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Adhered Versions / Total Number of Versions * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Total number of audits performed to assess the accuracy and compliance of configuration items and processes.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Total Number of Configuration Audits Conducted

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Percentage of configurations compliant with standards.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of configurations that meet established internal or external standards.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Compliant Configurations / Total Number of Configurations * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of users or departments adopting and using the configuration management system for their needs.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Users Adopted the System / Total Number of Users * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Accuracy of identifying configuration items correctly according to system records and standards.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Accurate Identifications / Total Identifications * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Configuration management cost per configuration item.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average cost associated with managing each configuration item, including administrative and operational expenses.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Total Cost of Configuration Management / Total Number of Configuration Items
